comments.body: What do you think of adding the phase and datasource kind as a metric label?

Hm... I actually don't have any opinion on that. :) But if we agree it's useful to add them here, I don't mind doing it. These metrics are still alpha, I assume it's also for us to figure out which are useful and give us opportunity to make changes.
I think they would be useful so you can also get a count of pvs in bound/available/released/lost phases, and datasource is useful so you can tell if it's a snapshot restore/clone/populator/etc
